description: A former government research facility island split between fire and ice. The site where the Straw Hats and Heart Pirates formed their alliance and defeated Caesar Clown.

keyEvents.title: Victory Feast on Punk Hazard
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hat Pirates and G-5 Marines gather on Punk Hazard to celebrate their victory over Caesar Clown with a feast prepared by Sanji.
keyEvents.significance: Marks the conclusion of the Punk Hazard arc with a moment of peace and celebration before departure.

keyEvents.title: Kin'emon and Momonosuke Reunion
keyEvents.description: Father and son are reunited on Punk Hazard after being separated during the arc.
keyEvents.significance: Provides emotional closure to one of the arc's personal storylines.

keyEvents.title: Law Reveals Plan to Defeat Kaidou
keyEvents.description: On Punk Hazard, Law formally reveals the alliance's goal to challenge one of the Four Emperors.
keyEvents.significance: Establishes the next phase of the story while still on Punk Hazard.

statusHistory.reason: Government research facility being used by Caesar Clown
